Sentencas: Oxide-ion conductors have found applications in various electrochemical devices, such as solid-oxide fuel cells, gas sensors, and separation membranes.
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ

Sentencas: Dion-Jacobson phases are known for their rich magnetic and electrical properties; however, there have been no reports on oxide-ion conduction in this family of materials.
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ

Sentencas: Here, for the first time to the best of our knowledge, we show the observation of fast oxygen anionic conducting behavior in CsBi2Ti2NbO10-delta.
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ

Sentencas: The bulk ionic conductivity of this Dion-Jacobson phase is 8.9 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 1073 K, a level that is higher than that of the conventional yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ

Sentencas: The oxygen ion transport is attributable to the large anisotropic thermal motions of oxygen atoms, the presence of oxygen vacancies, and the formation of oxide-ion conducting layers in the crystal structure.
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ

Sentencas: The present finding of high oxide-ion conductivity in rare-earth-free CsBi2Ti2NbO10-delta suggests the potential of Dion-Jacobson phases as a platform to identify superior oxide-ion conductors.
Titulo: Oxide-ion conduction in the Dion-Jacobson phase CsBi2Ti2NbO10-δ
